A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was wonderful! \n\nFunny and feelsy. Well written. Well directed. There was a lot going on but it never lost the thread. Questions answered. Great set-up for the next installment. Delves pretty deep into Jedi mysticism. Porgs are OK. It's different but still feel like a solid part of the Star Wars universe. I honestly don't know what people who don't like it are talking about. I loved it.
